formatted_address: 28 Cavenagh Rd, #01-02 Hotel Chancellor, @ Orchard, Singapore 229635
name: YUĒ BAR - 约吧

reviews.text: Awesome place for gathering with friends. Great sound system and games for entertainment. Prices are reasonable and the staff here are very responsive to my enquiries and also very willing to make accommodations for me and my friends. I love how they renovated the place to provide a better atmosphere and experience. Overall my friends and I had a very enjoyable time. Highly recommended.

Friendly owners who are all down for a good time with guests! Great atmosphere and excellent service.

If you're looking for a place to unwind after a long day of work, head here for a relaxed atmosphere and the same venue for a night of fun!

The bar had really good karaoke and sound system. The food and drinks were reasonably priced and was really tasty! I’d recommend coming here for a fun night out or drinks after work because the staffs working served from their heart and were all really helpful and happy to assist you when needed. Great food, great vibes. Happy customer!
Tip top service and very friendly staff and bosses! Everyone sings so well and are so friendly!!

There are value for money bundled alcohol rates. Considering this is in orchard, I feel the price point is attractive.
The crowd is also attractive and many sing well.
The sound system is a 7/10 on some nights while 9/10 on other nights.
